sentence.Network_en: The OECD's first China survey will be released in mid - September.
sentence.Network_cn: 经合组织的首份中国调查报告将在9月 中旬 发布.

sentence.Network_en: The region already struggling before the financial crisis intensified in mid - September.
sentence.Network_cn: 金融危机已经在九月 中旬 加剧,整个欧元区已经在与危机斗争.

sentence.Network_en: Our school term starts in mid - September.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们学校9月 中旬 开学.

PerfectNetExp.abs: mid-season 赛季中期, mid-september 月中旬, mid-segment 中段

auth_sentence.content: Brokers had to close with WFC by mid September.

auth_sentence.content: The grape harvest is from mid-September to early October.

auth_sentence.content: BCC's usually develop in mid to late life.
